QuestData.Title: Absholutely... Thish Will Work!
QuestData.Description: Voila, inshtant plague vacshine!$B$BBut I sure as heck am not going to try thish on myself. And I know you don't want to be my tesht shubject!$B$BOh, I've got... I've got an idea!$B$BWe've got a vrykul prishoner being held down in the cells under the keep. Why don't you take thish mix I whipped up down there, and get that giant to drink it ...hic?!
QuestData.LogDescription: Peppy Wrongnozzle at Westguard Keep has suggested that you take her Peppy's Special Mix and administer it to the Dragonflayer Vrykul Prisoner to witness its results.
QuestData.RewardText: Huh? Well that sucks! Darn, I made thingsh worsh. In fact, I think I perfected their plague for them ...hic!$B$B<Peppy grimaces and takes a huge gulp of whatever noxious brew she's been drinking.>$B$BWell, I wash hoping that it wouldn't come down to thish, but it looks like there'sh no alternative ...hic.

Objectives.Objective: Peppy's Mix Administered To The Vrykul Prisoner
